name: Good Neighbor Assisted Living Services INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Good Neighbor Assisted Living Services INC is a Home Health provider based in Goodyear, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $101.3M in Medicaid payments across 295K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $101.3M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 12,660 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
